tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage

definition.text: Take a good look at the first few candles in the data set. Do you see anything unusual?

paragraphs.text: The Bollinger SubChannels does not exist for the first 19 candles! Hence, the object is undefined!
The indicator derives from the Bollinger Bands, and the bands require at least 20 periods of historic data to be calculated. That is why it's undefined for 19 candles.
If we want to test a certain time range, we must make sure that all indicators we use in our trading system are calculated for the full range!
